name: Platformer in development: 6 levels done (2 worlds)
name_original: Platformer in development: 6 levels done (2 worlds)
description:
Platformer done during the Unity3D Mastery Course 2018, still in development.

Update 1:
-Level 3 and 4 added

Update 2:
-Collectable heart and hidden object added.
-UI now changing with screen size.
-Now, when coin reach 20, it is transformed in an extra live.

Update 3:
- Sugar world added with 2 levels => world choice added on the menu
